statements: SELECT * FROM investor_data;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name FROM investor_data ORDER BY investor_id DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investor_data WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY market_value ASC;
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM market_data WHERE market_value < 50000;
SELECT * FROM investor_data WHERE investment_amount > 5000
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investor_data WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY market_value DESC
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM market_data WHERE market_value < 10000
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount, market_name, market_value FROM investor_data JOIN market_data ON investor_data.investor_id = market_data.market_id
SELECT * FROM investor_data
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investor_data
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investor_data WHERE investment_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY market_name DESC
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM market_data WHERE market_value < 50000
SELECT * FROM investor_data ORDER BY investor_id DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investor_data WHERE investment_amount > 50000;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, investment_amount FROM investor_data WHERE investor_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM investor_data WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM market_data WHERE market_value < 100000 ORDER BY market_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM investors;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name FROM investors ORDER BY investor_name DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM markets WHERE market_value > 1000 ORDER BY market_value ASC;
SELECT investor_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investors GROUP BY investor_id HAVING total_investment > 50000;

SELECT investor_name, market_name, investment_date FROM investors JOIN investor_market_data ON investors.investor_id = investor_market_data.investor_id JOIN markets ON investor_market_data.market_id = markets.market_id WHERE correlation_coefficient > 0.8 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investors ORDER BY investment_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investors WHERE investment_amount > 10000;

SELECT investor_name, market_name, investment_date FROM investors i JOIN investor_market_data imd ON i.investor_id = imd.investor_id JOIN markets m ON m.market_id = imd.market_id ORDER BY investment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT market_name, AVG(correlation_coefficient) AS avg_correlation FROM investor_market_data GROUP BY market_name HAVING AVG(correlation_coefficient) > 0.5;

SELECT investor_id, investor_name, market_name, investment_date FROM investors i JOIN investor_market_data imd ON i.investor_id = imd.investor_id JOIN markets m ON m.market_id = imd.market_id WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY investment_date ASC LIMIT 6;
SELECT * FROM investors;
SELECT market_name, market_value, market_date FROM markets ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investors WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT investor_name, market_name, correlation_value FROM investor_market_join WHERE correlation_value > 0.5 ORDER BY correlation_value DESC;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, investment_amount, market_name FROM investor_market_join WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM investors;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investors WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT investor_name, market_name, correlation_value FROM investor_market_join WHERE correlation_value < 0;
SELECT * FROM markets ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT investor_name, market_name FROM investor_market_join JOIN markets ON investor_market_join.market_id = markets.market_id;
SELECT * FROM investors;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name FROM investors ORDER BY investor_id DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM markets WHERE market_value > 10000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT investor_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY investor_id HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM investors WHERE investor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM markets ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investors JOIN transactions ON investors.investor_id = transactions.investor_id WHERE transaction_amount > 50000;

SELECT market_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM markets JOIN transactions ON markets.market_id = transactions.market_id GROUP BY market_name ORDER BY total_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
